column4: bug in ubuntu - booting up with incorrect time shows dialog stating time is incorrect with message that you can run into errors. two choice buttons, ignore and change time. click on change time and states you don't have rights to perform admin task with no other prompts. have to kill xwindows and choose ignore instead.
launchpad.net is the proper place to report bugs
i am getting craploads of NOT AUTHENTICATED messages on package updates and installs these days where I never saw them before. some aren't even from outside repos. What gives?
